docs.title: About the Game of Thrones Demo
docs.text: This is for doing simple demos of a social network.

docs.title: Customer 360 Data Model
docs.text: Our data model is just a single vertex type called Person with a RELATED edge to itself (reflexive).

docs.title: Sample Game-of-Thrones Data
docs.text:
We found a sample Game of Thrones dataset on * Kaggle

If two names were mentioned within 15 words a link count was created:

Source,Target,Type,weight,book
Addam-Marbrand,Jaime-Lannister,Undirected,3,1
Addam-Marbrand,Tywin-Lannister,Undirected,6,1
Aegon-I-Targaryen,Daenerys-Targaryen,Undirected,5,1
Aegon-I-Targaryen,Eddard-Stark,Undirected,4,1
Aemon-Targaryen-(Maester-Aemon),Alliser-Thorne,Undirected,4,1

docs.title: Count the number of Person Verticies
docs.text:
We will use the size() function:

CREATE DISTRIBUTED QUERY countPeople() FOR GRAPH got Syntax V2{ 
  P = {Person.*};
  R = SELECT p FROM P:p;
  PRINT R.size();
}
